description: All agents have the same number of activities (34), which is unusual and may indicate a logging or reporting issue.
recommendation: Investigate the logging system to ensure that activities are being recorded accurately and verify that there is no malfunction in the activity tracking mechanism.

description: API latency is significantly higher (79.56 ms) compared to other performance metrics, which may indicate a bottleneck or inefficiency in the system.
recommendation: Conduct a detailed analysis of the API calls to identify potential bottlenecks or inefficiencies. Consider optimizing the API endpoints or scaling resources to improve latency.

description: Throughput is relatively high (129.56), which might suggest the system is under heavy load or operating at high capacity.
recommendation: Monitor the system to ensure that the high throughput does not lead to performance degradation. Consider load balancing or scaling up resources if necessary.

description: Compliance status is marked as true for both performance and reliability, which is expected. However, continuous monitoring is necessary to ensure ongoing compliance.
recommendation: Maintain regular audits and monitoring to ensure compliance with performance and reliability standards. Implement automated alerts for any deviations.
